title: 求助，为什么一进地皮世界，服务器就崩溃？
author: MC_墨俊
txt_content: 20.04 09:49:11 [服务器] 警告 Cauldron has removed EntityPhantomSwordBase['entity.flammpfeil.slashblade.PhantomSwordBase.name'/347, l='plotworld', x=Infinity, y=Infinity, z=Infinity] to prevent a server crash.20.04 09:49:11 [服务器] 警告 Entity is at Infinity,Infinity (chunk 2147483647,2147483647) but was stored in chunk -19,-1720.04 09:49:11 [服务器] 警告 Wrong location for EntityPhantomSwordBase['entity.flammpfeil.slashblade.PhantomSwordBase.name'/347, l='plotworld', x=Infinity, y=Infinity, z=Infinity] in world 'plotworld'!

replies.author: 论坛好网友
replies.txt_content:
应该生成错误
从新生成一下或者替换地皮
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1geK2Ibx

replies.author: weiliang_dada
replies.txt_content: 更换拔刀剑版本为r77版本，r87版本极容易造成服务器崩溃

replies.author: 创世之巅
